summary: This is a forwarded email from July 22, 2020, with the subject 'FW: Necheles Submission', containing an attachment titled 'plea_submission,_with_attachments.pdf'. The email forwards a prior message from July 20, 2020, sent to 'Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney' at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, regarding a submission from 'Necheles'.

persons.name: Necheles
persons.context: The email subject and forwarded message reference a 'Necheles Submission', indicating this individual or law firm is submitting legal materials to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Necheles Submission to U.S. Attorney's Office
events.description: A submission from 'Necheles' was sent to the Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Forwarding of Necheles Submission
events.description: The email regarding the Necheles submission was forwarded to another recipient, with the plea submission attachment.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated July 22, 2020, concerning a legal submission from 'Necheles'.
The submission is attached as a PDF file named 'plea_submission,_with_attachments.pdf', suggesting it may relate to a plea agreement or plea-related filing.
The original submission was sent on July 20, 2020, to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The correspondence involves communication between legal counsel and federal prosecutors, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
